summary: This bill, the "Nutria Eradication and Control Reauthorization Act of 2025," aims to extend the Nutria Eradication and Control Act of 2003. It reauthorizes the program by amending the original act, specifically changing the date references (most notably extending the program to 2030) and making a minor technical correction related to the Secretary's role. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on January 28, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Natural Resources.
